org.fujion.highcharts

Class ButtonOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.highcharts.ButtonOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class ButtonOptions
extends Options
    Options for buttons (e.g., print or export buttons).

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • align

        @Option
public AlignHorizontal align
        Alignment for the buttons. Defaults to "right".

      • buttonSpacing

        @Option
public Integer buttonSpacing
        The pixel spacing between buttons. Defaults to 3.

      • className

        @Option
public String className
        The CSS class name of the context button. Defaults to highcharts-contextbutton.

      • enabled

        @Option
public Boolean enabled
        Whether to enable buttons. Defaults to true.

      • height

        @Option
public Integer height
        Pixel height of the buttons. Defaults to 20.

      • menuClassName

        @Option
public String menuClassName
        The class name of the menu appearing from the button. Defaults to highcharts-contextmenu.

      • menuItems

        @Option
public final List<ActionOptions> menuItems
        A collection of config options for the menu items. Each options object consists of a text option which is a string to show in the menu item, as well as an onclick parameter which is a callback function to run on click. By default, there is one menu item for each of the available export types. Menu items can be customized by defining a new array of items and assigning null to unwanted positions.

      • onclick

        @Option(convertTo=JavaScript.class)
public String onclick
        A click handler callback to use on the button directly instead of the default. The "this" variable will be the Highcharts object.

      • symbol

        @Option
public String symbol
        The symbol for the button. Points to a definition function in the Highcharts.Renderer.symbols collection. The default exportIcon function is part of the exporting module. Defaults to menu.

      • symbolFill

        @Option
public String symbolFill
        Defaults to #666666.

      • symbolSize

        @Option
public Integer symbolSize
        The pixel size of the symbol on the button. Defaults to 14.

      • symbolStroke

        @Option
public String symbolStroke
        The color of the symbol's stroke or line. Defaults to #666666.

      • symbolStrokeWidth

        @Option
public Integer symbolStrokeWidth
        The pixel stroke width of the symbol on the button. Defaults to 1.

      • symbolX

        @Option
public Double symbolX
        The x position of the center of the symbol inside the button. Defaults to 12.5.

      • symbolY

        @Option
public Double symbolY
        The y position of the center of the symbol inside the button. Defaults to 10.5.

      • text

        @Option
public String text
        A text string to add to the individual button. Defaults to null.

      • verticalAlign

        @Option
public AlignVertical verticalAlign
        The vertical alignment of the buttons. Can be one of "top", "middle" or "bottom". Defaults to "top".

      • width

        @Option
public Integer width
        The pixel width of the button. Defaults to 24.

      • x

        @Option
public Integer x
        The horizontal position of the button relative to the align option. Defaults to -10.

      • y

        @Option
public Integer y
        The vertical offset of the button's position relative to its verticalAlign. Defaults to 0.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ButtonOptions

        public ButtonOptions()
